SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.cajuscript
Class CajuScript

java.lang.Object
  org.cajuscript.CajuScript

public class CajuScript
extends java.lang.Object

The core of the CajuScript language.

Sample:

 try {
     CajuScript caju = new CajuScript();
     String javaHello = "Java: Hello!";
     caju.set("javaHello", javaHello);
     String script = "$java.lang;";
     script += "System.out.println(javaHello);";
     script += "cajuHello = \"Caju: Hi!\";";
     caju.eval(script);
     System.out.println(caju.get("cajuHello"));
 } catch (Exception e) {
     e.printStackTrace();
 }

To execute a file:

 try {
     CajuScript caju = new CajuScript();
     caju.evalFile("file.cj");
 } catch (Exception e) {
     e.printStackTrace();
 }

CajuScript syntax:

 \ Imports
 $java.lang
 
 \ Defining a new variable
 x = 0
 
 \ LOOP
 x < 10 & x >= 0 @
    System.out.println(x)
    x = x + 1
 @
 
 \ IF
 x < 10 | x > 0 ?
     System.out.println("X is less than 10!")
 ? x > 10 & x = 10 ?
     System.out.println("X is greater than 10!")
 ??
     System.out.println("X = "+ x)
 ?
 
 \ FUNCTION
 \ Allowed:
 \ addWithX v1, v2 # ... #
 \ addWithX(v1 v2) # ... #
 addWithX(v1, v2) #
     \ "~" is the return
     ~ x + v1 + v2
 #
 
 x = addWithX(1, 2)
 
 System.out.println("X = "+ x)

Null value:

 \ $ is the null value
 x = $

Arithmetic Operators:

 \ + Addition
 x = 0 + 1
 x += 1
 
 \ - Subtraction
 x = 0 - 1
 x -= 1
 
 \ * Multiplication
 x = 0 * 1
 x *= 1
 
 \ / Division
 x = 0 / 1
 x /= 1
 
 \ % Modulus
 x = 0 % 1
 x %= 1

Comparison Operators:

 \ = Equal to
 (x = y)
 
 \ ! Not equal to
 (x ! y)
 
 \ < Less Than
 (x < y)
 
 \ > Greater Than
 (x > y)
 
 \ < Less Than or Equal To
 (x <= y)
 
 \ > Greater Than or Equal To
 (x >= y)

Imports or include file:

 \ Import
 $java.lang
 
 \ Include file
 $"script.cj"

See Also:
Constant Field Values

CAJU_VARS_GROUP

public static final java.lang.String CAJU_VARS_GROUP
Commands embraced by parenthesis are executed and the value is saved on variables whit this name. All parenthesis are replaced by variables whit the final value when the line is interpreted.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

CajuScript

public CajuScript()
           throws CajuScriptException
Create a newly instance of Caju Script. The variables caju and array are initialized.

Throws:
CajuScriptException - Problems on starting
